data.name: Alice
data.text: Re 洞主: [Alice] Re Bob: 请听题，一对情侣去旅游发生故意杀人案，问杀人犯如何无罪🐸

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
Re Alice: 1）我不学法律对于这类的法律问题其实并没有特别的了解，2）还有什么细节吗？总不能就说一句“一对情侣去旅游发生故意杀人案”？
首先谁是受害人，谁是犯罪嫌疑人？案发过程是什么？几个方面的口供录下来了吗？找的证据能够形成完整的证据链了吗？

data.name: Alice
data.text:
Re 洞主: #477964 政治相关大约17小时之前 9-14 14:23:50
大陆这法治建设，稍微可以理解香港人为什么要“反送中”了。

data.name: Alice
data.text: Re 洞主: 提示已经给出

data.name: 洞主
data.text: 杀人犯应当无期徒刑#乱说话#

post.text:
It’s like, we live in a room, and there’s a poster on the wall. We stare at it and we think that’s the whole world, the room and the poster. The picture’s something nice, a landscape, a famous person. Like in that movie, what’s it called, the prison movie? The room’s a cell. And the picture, it’s different for each of us. It can be beautiful or terrible, but we’re all transfixed.” “But it’s all a lie. Something to distract us from the truth. They’re lying to us. We’re lying to ourselves. The room’s not the world, the world is much bigger and much stranger. There’s a hole hidden behind that poster that leads to the real world. We all feel safe in that room. But sometimes, sometimes, something crawls out from behind the poster.
And the ones that see it happen, freak out, and try to forget what they saw.
--ThE Yellow Wallpaper


观货拉拉司机开庭案的所谓的“程序正义”
